General.Name: Hyperfine Inc
General.Description: Hyperfine, Inc., a medical device company, provides magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) products. Its products include Swoop Portable MR imaging system, which offers neuroimaging at the point of care. The company was incorporated in 2014 and is based in Guilford, Connecticut.
General.Address: 351 New Whitfield Street, Guilford, CT, United States, 06437
